document_data.name: Green Chapel
document_data.mainbody: The '''Green Chapel''' was an [[inn]] found in the city of [[Urling]] in [[Rashemen]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.
document_data.Activities: Though visiting the nearby [[Urlingwood]] was strictly forbidden upon pain of death, foreigners were allowed to travel through Urling. The Green Chapel catered to these travelers, though they were discouraged from staying longer than a few days.
